crits.name: Losing Power to Shields
crits.desc: Decrease defense in affected defense zone by 1 until repaired. If ship or vehicle has no defense, suffer 1 system strain.

crits.name: Tailspin
crits.desc: All firing from ship or vehicle suffers 2 Setbacks until end of pilot’s next turn.

crits.name: Engine Damaged
crits.desc: Ship or vehicle ’s maximum speed reduced by 1, to a minimum of 1, until repaired.

crits.name: Shields Down
crits.desc: Decrease defense in affected defense zone to 0 and all other defense zones by 1 point until repaired. If ship or vehicle has no defense, suffer 4 system strain.

crits.name: Fire!
crits.desc: Fire rages through ship or vehicle and it immediately takes 2 system strain. Fire can be extinguished with appropriate skill, Vigilance or Cool checks at GM’s discretion. Takes one round per two silhouette to put out.

crits.name: Power Fluctuations
crits.desc: Pilot cannot voluntarily inflict system strain on the ship until repaired.

crits.name: Mechanical Stress
crits.desc: Ship or vehicle suffers 1 system strain.

crits.name: Component Hit
crits.desc: Component from Small Ship Components or Large Ship Components (see tables below) is rendered inoperable until end of next round.

crits.name: Hyperdrive or Navicomputer Failure
crits.desc: Cannot make any jump to hyperspace until repaired. If ship or vehicle has no hyperdrive, navigation systems fail leaving it unable to tell where it is or is going

crits.name: Shield Overload
crits.desc: Decrease defense in all defense zones to 0 until repaired. In addition, suffer 2 system strain. Cannot be repaired until end of encounter. If ship or vehicle has no defense, reduce armor by 1 until repaired.

crits.name: Engines Down
crits.desc: Ship or vehicle’s maximum speed reduced to 0. In addition, ship or vehicle cannot execute  maneuvers until repaired. Ship continues on course at current speed and cannot be stopped or course changed until repaired.
